articles.title: Former Sri Lanka, CSK star Suraj Randiv is now a bus driver in Australia - The Indian Express
articles.description: Suraj Randiv, who was a part of Sri Lanka’s playing eleven in the 2011 World Cup final, has become a bus driver in Australia to make ends meet after parting his ways with the sport.
articles.content: Destiny is not a matter of chance but a matter of choice and for former Sri Lankan and Chennai Super Kings (CSK) off-spinner Suraj Randiv, this same destiny has taken his life in a completely new dir… [+1102 chars]
